name: The Case of the Missing Toys
name_original: The Case of the Missing Toys
description:
Made for Make-a-thing, Januray 2019 using the words:

Trace, Sleep and Amaranth

Controls:

WASD - Move around

SPACE - Jump

Use the circles of light to jump between planets while finding your lost toys along the way. Walk over the toys to pick them up.

Sorry about the camera it's pretty janky and there are some bits missing or unfinished. There's also a bug where if you walk near the poles of the planets you get sucked into a spinning vortex and you wont be able to get out so try to stay away from them.
